Sql.CDATA:
IF NOT Exists(select * from GIMappingPreset where ScreenID = 'AR205000') insert into GIMappingPreset values (2,'AR205000', 'PX.Objects.AR.SalesPersonMaint')
IF NOT Exists(select * from GIMappingPreset where ScreenID = 'IN202500') insert into GIMappingPreset values (2,'IN202500', 'PX.Objects.IN.InventoryItemMaint')
